channel.title: PHP Template error
channel.description:
Well hopfully I will be learning more php but currently im learning off of Ron's PHP template tutorial but I get these errors..
Warning: main(website/top.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/www/*****.awardspace.com/index.php on line 3 Warning: main(): Failed opening 'website/top.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/usr/local/php4/share/pear') in /home/www/******.awardspace.com/index.php on line 3 Warning: main(website/left.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/www/****.awardspace.com/index.php on line 5 Warning: main(): Failed opening 'website/left.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/usr/local/php4/share/pear') in /home/www/****.awardspace.com/index.php on line 5 Warning: main(website/home.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/www/******.awardspace.com/index.php on line 7 Warning: main(): Failed opening 'website/home.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/usr/local/php4/share/pear') in /home/www/*****.awardspace.com/index.php on line 7 Warning: main(website/bottom.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/www/*******.awardspace.com/index.php on line 9 Warning: main(): Failed opening 'website/bottom.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/usr/local/php4/share/pear') in /home/www/*****.awardspace.com/index.php on line 9

item.title: PHP Template error

item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Well hopfully I will be learning more php but currently im learning off of Ron’s PHP template tutorial but I get these errors…

Warning: main(website/top.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/www/*****.awardspace.com/index.php on line 3

Warning: main(): Failed opening ‘website/top.php’ for inclusion (include_path=’.:/usr/local/php4/share/pear’) in /home/www/******.awardspace.com/index.php on line 3

Warning: main(website/bottom.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/www/*******.awardspace.com/index.php on line 9
